pages.index: Sun Power - Leading Solar Panel Manufacturing and Installation in India sunpower@gmail.com +91 (865) 7946852 Patna, Bihar 800001, India Home About us Our Team Contacts "Sun Power" Welcome to our website. At Sun Power, we are dedicated to creating a sustainable future through advanced solar energy solutions. Explore our products, services, and discover how we are powering the future with clean energy. LEARN MORE Benefits of Sun Power Panels Our solar panel systems offer a variety of advantages tailored to meet the specific requirements of our clients. Efficient Design Our solar panels are meticulously designed to optimize energy generation, ensuring maximum efficiency. Reliable Performance Our solar panel systems guarantee consistent and dependable performance, even in challenging conditions. Environmentally Friendly Our solar panels contribute to a cleaner environment by harnessing renewable energy sources, reducing carbon emissions. Initial Stages Before finalizing a solar panel installation contract, the following steps must be completed. Consultation In this phase, our experts will conduct a detailed consultation to fully understand your energy needs and goals. Proposal After the consultation, we will prepare a tailored proposal outlining the services, timelines, and costs, ensuring mutual agreement. Agreement Upon agreement of all terms, we will draft a contract that includes all agreed-upon conditions, rights, and obligations of both parties. Our Advantages We Offer the Following Benefits Over Our Competitors Expertise High level of professionalism from our specialists. Innovation Continuous implementation of new technologies. Customization Individualized approach to each client. Quality Guaranteed quality of service. Efficiency Optimization of work processes. Reliability Long-lasting and stable solutions. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Sun Power sunpower@gmail.com +91 (865) 7946852 Patna, Bihar 800001, India Home About us Our Team Contacts Privacy Policy Introduction: At Sun Power, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you visit our website or use our services. Information We Collect: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services. This includes personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and postal address, as well as non-personal information like browser type, IP address, and browsing behavior. How We Use Your Information: The information we collect is used to personalize your experience, improve our website, process transactions, send periodic emails, and respond to your inquiries. We also use your data to enhance our customer service and support efforts. Consent: By using our website and services, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. We will ask for your explicit consent before using your data for any purposes not covered by this policy. Data Security: We implement a variety of security measures to ensure the safety of your personal information. Your data is stored on secure servers and protected by advanced encryption technologies to prevent unauthorized access. Third-Party Disclosure: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties without your consent, except as necessary to provide our services or comply with legal obligations. Third-Party Links: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. These sites have separate and independent privacy policies, and we have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Google Analytics: We use Google Analytics to analyze the use of our website. Google Analytics generates statistical, which are stored on users' computers. The information generated is used to create reports about the use of our website. Data Retention: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected and to comply with legal, regulatory, or internal policy requirements. Your Rights: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also object to or restrict the processing of your data and request data portability. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below. Children’s Privacy: Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will delete such information immediately. Changes to This Policy: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we will notify you via email or a prominent notice on our website prior to the change becoming effective. Contact Information: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at sunpower@gmail.com. International Transfers: Your information may be transferred to and maintained on servers located outside of your state, province, country, or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ from those of your jurisdiction. Data Breach Procedures: In the event of a data breach, we will notify affected users as soon as possible and take all necessary steps to mitigate the impact of the breach. We will also comply with all legal requirements regarding data breach notifications. Data Controller and Processor: Sun Power acts as both a data controller and processor under applicable data protection laws. As a controller, we determine the purposes and means of processing your personal data. As a processor, we process data on behalf of other controllers. Governing Law: This Privacy Policy and any disputes related to it are governed by the laws of India. Any legal actions or proceedings arising from this policy shall be brought exclusively in the courts located in India. Contacts: +91 (865) 7946852 sunpower@gmail.com Patna, Bihar 800001, India Information Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Sun Power sunpower@gmail.com +91 (865) 7946852 Patna, Bihar 800001, India Home About us Our Team Contacts Terms and Conditions Introduction: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the Sun Power website and services. By accessing or using our site, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our services. Use of the Website: You may use our website for lawful purposes only. You must not use it in a way that violates any applicable local, national, or international law or regulation, or in a manner that is unlawful or fraudulent. Intellectual Property: All content on the Sun Power website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Sun Power or its content suppliers and is protected by intellectual property laws. Unauthorized use of this content is prohibited. User Accounts: To access certain features of our website, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. Privacy Policy: Your use of our website is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which details how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. By using our site, you consent to the practices described in the Privacy Policy. Product Information and Availability: We strive to ensure that all information on our website is accurate and up-to-date. However, we do not guarantee that product descriptions, pricing, or availability are error-free. We reserve the right to correct any errors and to change or update information without prior notice. Orders and Payment: By placing an order through our website, you agree to provide accurate and complete information. All orders are subject to acceptance and availability. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason. Shipping and Delivery: We aim to deliver products within the estimated time frames provided. However, delivery times are not guaranteed and may be affected by factors beyond our control. We are not liable for any delays in delivery. Returns and Refunds: Our return and refund policy outlines the conditions under which products can be returned and refunds issued. Please review this policy carefully before making a purchase. Limitation of Liability: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Sun Power shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our website or services. Indemnification: You agree to indemnify and hold Sun Power, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents harmless from any claims, liabilities, damages, and expenses arising from your use of our website or violation of these terms. Termination: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our website, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms and Conditions. Changes to These Terms: We may update these Terms and Conditions from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we will notify you of any significant changes. Your continued use of the website after any changes indicates your acceptance of the new terms. Governing Law: These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes arising out of or related to these terms shall be resolved exclusively in the courts located in India. Severability: If any provision of these Terms and Conditions is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect. Waiver: The failure of Sun Power to enforce any right or provision of these terms will not be deemed a waiver of such right or provision. Any waiver must be in writing to be effective. Entire Agreement: These Terms and Conditions, along with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and Sun Power regarding your use of our website and services, superseding any prior agreements. Contact Information: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at sunpower@gmail.com. Contacts: +91 (865) 7946852 sunpower@gmail.com Patna, Bihar 800001, India Information Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
